sn_aia_usecase.base_plan:
This team can interact with IT liaisons to assist by listing services in a digital product, allowing the user to select one to build a playbook for. Finally, the team will present a link for the user to create the draft of the playbook.
Complete the steps in this order: 1. Get the services that are contained within the application and present them in a numbered list 2. Build a prompt that will be used to build the playbook draft 3. Generate the playbook URL and present the full URL to the user
sn_aia_usecase.description: Aid an IT liaison in taking steps to create a set of agent instructions for a given case and building those instructions into a playbook.
sn_aia_usecase.name: Digital Product Factory Playbook Builder
